message.content:
cs.DB, cs.AI, cs.LO, cs.SE, cs.PL

This paper deals with the problem of repairing inconsistent databases, which is a core topic in the field of database management (cs.DB). The paper also introduces an abductive application based on an SLDNFA-resolution procedure, which involves reasoning and inference (cs.AI). The model-theoretic analysis and characterization of the possibilities to recover consistent data from an inconsistent database involves logical reasoning and formal methods (cs.LO). The paper also discusses the implementation of the abductive solver and its application to database management, which falls under the category of software engineering (cs.SE). Finally, the paper involves the use of logic programming and abductive reasoning, which are topics in programming languages and compilers (cs.PL).
